data.comment: The big names in today's match at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium have now been confirmed.
Birmingham kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
In the minute 19, Adama Diakhaby (Huddersfield) gets a yellow card.
Goal! Birmingham take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Gary Gardner.
Ivan Sunjic for Birmingham has been booked by Leigh Doughty and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Huddersfield kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Alex Pritchard is on a sub for Juninho Bacuna for Huddersfield.
In the minute 57, Lewis O'Brien is replacing Jonathan Hogg for Huddersfield at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
Aitor Karanka (Birmingham) is making a first substitution, with Lukas Jutkiewicz replacing Scott Hogan.
The home team replace Ivan Sunjic with Adam Clayton.
In the minute 75, Mikel San Jose is booked for the home team.
Birmingham make their third substitution with Jonathan Leko replacing Gary Gardner.
Isaac Mbenza is replacing Adama Diakhaby for the away team.
In the minute 85, Isaac Mbenza levels the score at 1-1.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Lukas Jutkiewicz is on target to give Birmingham a 2-1 advantage.
